amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to research, develop, manufacture, or procure a newly designed flight suit or integrated aircrew ensemble.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to research, develop, manufacture, or procure a newly designed flight suit or integrated aircrew ensemble.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kinzinger (IL) amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kinzinger (IL) amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Kinzinger (IL).
